<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 55

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn barding

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [light barding](/Rules.aspx?ID=255) is covered in wavelike patterns. The barding adjusts to fit your animal companion regardless of its shape.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You trace a finger along the wave patterns on the barding, granting your companion a swim Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes. If your companion already had a swim Speed, it gains a +10-foot item bonus to its swim Speed for 10 minutes instead. Even if the companion doesn't have the mount special ability, it can still Swim while being ridden.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
